attributes.action: cancel the exemption from the tax on personal pension funds granted to the Prime Minister and the Chancellor of the Exchequer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Chancellor of the Excchequer introduced a tax on personal pension funds in excess of £1.4 million.  However he also exempted himself and the Prime Minister from the tax.  And just to ensure that this could not be overturned in the Courts he also exempted High Court Judges.

This is manifestly unfair since it creates one taxation system for the people as a whole and another one for the most powerful in the land.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
